local_intent: Perceive cloth, set lateral yaw, approach and align to right edge, then verify pose/orientation.
assumptions: Safe approach height is already ensured by prior motion
coherence_with_global: Matches global detect-or-scan, sets yaw=90, performs ApproachAndAlign(tol=0.01,1200ms) with retry for misalignment, then verifies position and orientation before subsequent contact and push steps.
